recipesJson.name: Ripe
recipesJson.author: DIYDownunderPippa
recipesJson.description:
A special all Molinberry recipe I have prepared for you all. 

A delicious "Cherry Ripe" recipe that is just how it should be. 
A lovely layer of delectable cookie textured with a little coconut with a lovely soft cherry & coconut center while covered with a silky rich chocolate. 

"The Texture and balance of flavor is simply delicious" 

If you don't have the wonderful Molinberry Sweetener Blend you can use Capella Super Sweet at 0.5% for a very similar result. 

Enjoy!! 

Note: I enjoyed creating this recipe on a SST Alien Coil 0.2ohm on a Wotofo Recurve RDA at 60W 

5 Days Steep for best Results.
